text: Boaz is a city in Etowah and Marshall Counties in the U.S. state of Alabama. The city is named after the husband of Ruth, from the Book of Ruth in the Bible. It is part of the 'Gadsden, Alabama Metropolitan Statistical Area'. As of the 2020 census, the population of the city is 10,107. == References == Category:Cities in Alabama Category:1897 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in Alabama
title: Boaz, Alabama
